THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail's bold text 'MOVE IN SILENCE' directly supports the video's promise of becoming 'unrecognizable' and rebranding oneself—in line with the title's themes of transformation, subtlety, and personal growth.
